title: GenAI 101: Getting Started with a Vector Database
description:
As AI applications continue to evolve, managing and querying complex data has become a challenge. That’s where vector databases come in. But what exactly is a vector database, and why should you care? Join our livestream to find out! We’ll break down embeddings, how vector databases help with everything from natural language processing to recommendation systems, and how to make AI projects responses more relevant.

We’ll also dive into Astra DB, DataStax’s own scalable, high-performance vector database. You’ll see how it fits into your current workflow and why it’s a game-changer for building AI-driven apps without the headache of managing infrastructure.

What you’ll learn:
--What a vector database is and why it matters for AI development
--How to use vector databases in real-world projects
--Why Astra DB makes working with vector databases easier
--Steps to get started with Astra and boost your AI projects

RESOURCES:
Sign up for Astra DB: https://bit.ly/3zJlQTj
DataStax AI PaaS: https://www.datastax.com/products/ai-platform-as-a-service-paas
DataStax Docs: https://docs.datastax.com/en/astra-db-serverless/get-started/quickstart.html 

About DataStax Developer:
On the DataStax Developers YouTube channel, you can find tutorials, workshops and much more to help you learn and stay updated with the latest information on Apache Cassandra©.  Visit https://datastax.com/dev for more free learning resources.
